description: These 20 Minute BBQ Black Bean Tacos are SO easy to make and so delicious!  They're perfect for a family weeknight dinner!
name: 20 Minute BBQ Black Bean Tacos
recipeIngredient: 3 (15 ounce) cans black beans drained and rinsed, or about 4 1/2 cups
Optional toppings: avocado, cabbage, carrot, cilantro, hot sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan over medium heat and add olive oil and onion. Cook until softened, 2-3 minutes and then add garlic and cook for another 1-2 minutes.

Next, add in all the remaining ingredients, except for the black beans. Mix sauce together and cook for a minute or two. Add in the black beans, stir until they’re all coated and cook together for about 10 minutes, until heated through and flavors have developed.
For each taco, use about 1/3 cup black beans and top with desired toppings.
